<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/contacts"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of filtered mail contacts by the search query specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"search":{"description":"Text to search in contact names or emails","type":"string"},"contactType":{"description":"Contact type","type":"array","items":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"pageSize":{"description":"Number of contacts on the page","type":"array","items":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"fromIndex":{"description":"Page number","type":"integer"},"sortorder":{"description":"Sort order by name. String parameter: \"ascending\" or \"descending\"","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of filtered contacts","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"ContactId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Name":{"type":"string","example":"name"},"Description":{"type":"string","example":"description"},"Emails":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Value":{"type":"string","example":"value"},"IsPrimary":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ContactInfo"}},"PhoneNumbers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Value":{"type":"string","example":"value"},"IsPrimary":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"ContactInfo"}},"Type":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"SmallFotoUrl":{"type":"string","example":"smallFotoUrl"},"MediumFotoUrl":{"type":"string","example":"mediumFotoUrl"}},"title":"MailContactData"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
